General.Name: Avic Shenyang Aircraft Co Ltd
General.Description: AVIC Shenyang Aircraft Company Limited manufactures aviation products in China. It offers military and civil aviation products. The company was formerly known as Zhonghangheibao Co.,Ltd. AVIC Shenyang Aircraft Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China. AVIC Shenyang Aircraft Company Limited is a subsidiary of Aviation Industry Corporation of China,Ltd.
